required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase I, Single Centre, Study to Assess Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of AZD3043
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I, Single Centre, Open Label Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Intravenous AZD3043 After a Single Ascending Bolus Dose Followed by a Single Infusion Dose in Elderly (=65 Years) Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: Phase I, Single Centre, Open Label Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability,Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Intravenous AZD3043 after aSingle Ascending Bolus Dose Followed by a Single Infusion Dose in Elderly(=65 years) Healthy Volunteers

detailed_description.textblock: Phase I, Single Centre, Open Label Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Intravenous AZD3043 after a Single Ascending Bolus Dose Followed by a Single Infusion Dose in Elderly (=65 years) Healthy Volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate safety and tolerability after administration of a bolus and infusion of AZD3043
primary_outcome.time_frame: Heartrate, Bloodpressure, Telemetry, ECG, EtCO2, SPO2, BIS, Respiratory frequency every minute during a 1h session

secondary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the PK of AZD3043 and its main metabolite (THRX-108893) in venous blood samples
To evaluate the onset, level and recovery from sedation/anaesthesia

intervention.description: single dose/IV, bolus over 60secs - infusion over 30 mins

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pre-anaesthesia assessment judged without remarks by the investigator.
- ASA physical status category 1 to 2 (up to and including 3 depending on applicable patient category)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Lack of a normal range of enzyme activity for BuChE
- Known or suspected history of hypersensitivity to drugs with a similar chemical structure or class to AZD3043 (e.g., emulsion-based products like Diprivan,Intralipid), allergies to soybean or peanut products or any other drugs intended for use during th
- Prolonged QTcF >450 ms or shortened QTcF <350 ms or family history of long QT syndrome.

overall_official.affiliation: Quintiles Drug Research Unit at Guy's HospitalQuintiles Ltd6 Newcomen StreetLondonSE1 1YRUnited Kingdom
